TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PersonalizationScope extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指示 对象的个性化设置范围或应用于 Web 部件控件上的属性的个性化设置范围。

span.span: Indicates the personalization scope for a object or the personalization scope that applies to a property on a Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 个性化设置范围是 Web 部件个性化设置中的关键概念和其他设置，包括范围与紧密集成的页面，通过控件，是运行; 每个属性控制; 以及的方式上与关联的范围在其中控件已添加到页面。Personalization scope is a key concept in Web Parts personalization and is tightly integrated with other settings, including the scope that the page, through the control, is running in; the scope associated with each property on a control; and the way in which the control was added to the page. 个性化设置范围的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information on personalization scope, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). 个性化设置范围是指在适用于不同的用户个性化设置数据的方式。Personalization scope refers to how personalization data is applicable to different sets of users. 某些个性化设置数据是适用于特定用户和页面上的控件。Some personalization data is applicable to only a specific user and control on a page. 其他个性化设置数据是适用于所有用户查看站点。Other personalization data is applicable to all users who view a site. 个性化设置范围的个性化设置的不同区域中用于指示应检索和显示的数据集。Personalization scope is used in various areas of personalization to indicate which set of data should be retrieved and displayed. 当共享个性化设置范围中运行页面时，这表示应加载仅特定控件，适用于所有用户查看该控件的个性化设置数据。When a page is running in Shared personalization scope, this indicates that only the personalization data for a specific control, applicable to all users viewing the control, should be loaded. 具体取决于当前正在执行用户的权限，这种通用数据可修改和保存回数据存储区。Depending on the currently executing user's rights, this broadly applicable data can also be modified and saved back to the data store. 当用户个性化设置作用域中运行页面时，这指示控件的个性化设置数据应保存和加载基于当前正在执行的用户。When a page is running in User personalization scope, this indicates that a control's personalization data should be saved and loaded based on the currently executing user. 通常情况下，这意味着可以加载和保存在一个控件，广泛适用的数据 （或共享的数据） 只能查看在控件上时特定于用户的数据。Usually, this means user-specific data can be loaded and saved on a control, while broadly applicable data (or shared data) can only be viewed on the control. 一个控件，用于管理个性化设置高级生命周期，执行两个个性化设置范围之一。A control, which manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, executes in one of the two personalization scopes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用枚举。The following code example demonstrates using the enumeration. [!code-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/PersAdmin.ascx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope Shared = int32(1)

summary.span: 当引用 控件上的范围时， 范围是指应用于页面上所有可个性化设置控件的全部用户并可保存在该页面上的个性化设置数据。

span.span: When referring to the scope on the control, scope means that personalization data applies to all users for all personalizable controls on a page and is also available to be saved on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 Web 部件控件属性关联的范围引用时`Shared`作用域表示的属性通常仅允许加载或保存的所有用户与关联的数据。When referring to the scope associated with a Web Parts control property, `Shared` scope indicates that the property normally only allows loading or saving of data associated with all users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope User = int32(0)

summary.span: 当涉及 控件上的范围时， 范围意味着，对于页面上的所有可个性化设置控件，特定于用户的个性化数据以及适用于所有用户的个性化数据都会被加载。

span.span: When referring to the scope on the control, scope means that personalization data that is user-specific, as well as personalization data that applies to all users, is loaded for all personalizable controls on a page.

summary.span: 只有特定于用户的个性化设置数据可以保存在页面上。

span.span: Only personalization data that is user-specific can be saved on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 Web 部件控件属性关联的范围引用时`User`作用域表示该属性只能加载和存储适用于所有用户数据时的页面上运行`Shared`作用域。When referring to the scope associated with a Web Parts control property, `User` scope indicates that the property can only load and store data applicable to all users when running on a page in `Shared` scope. 但是，该属性的控件运行时内的页面上`User`作用域、 属性的每个用户和所有用户数据会加载和合并。However, when the property's control is running on a page in `User` scope, the property's per-user and all-user data will be loaded and merged. 在这种情况下，不过，仅每用户数据将保存页在运行时`User`作用域。In this case, though, only per-user data will be saved when a page is running in `User` scope.
